title: thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None`  value',

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Follow https://github.com/elibroftw/modern-desktop-app-template Run `yarn cross-env RUST_BACKTRACE=full yarn dev` which is nothing but `yarn cross-env RUST_BACKTRACE=full yarn tauri dev` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: x86_64-pc-windows-msvc release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ```
Backtrace

``` Compiling app v0.1.0 (C:\Users\maste\Documents\GitHub\r2-t2\src-tauri) warning: unused imports: `collections::BTreeMap`, `fs` --> src\main.rs:8:11 | 8 | use std::{collections::BTreeMap, fs}; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^ | = note: `#[warn(unused_imports)]` on by default warning: unused import: `tauri::Manager` --> src\main.rs:10:5 | 10 | use tauri::Manager; // used by .get_window | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: unused import: `std::thread::sleep` --> src\main.rs:11:5 | 11 | use std::thread::sleep; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ warning: unused import: `std::time::Duration` --> src\main.rs:12:5 | 12 | use std::time::Duration; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /rustc/f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c\compiler\rustc_hir\src\definitions.rs:452:14 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffac10892cf -
